name: drupal/drupal_cms_seo_tools
description: Adds common search engine optimisation tools such as meta tags, XML sitemap, robots.txt management and more.

suggest.drupal/drupal_cms_google_analytics: Adds tracking of website traffic using Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager.
suggest.drupal/drupal_cms_accessibility_tools: Adds automated checks to help ensure content conforms to web accessibility guidelines.
